title: My ITX Dream PC Has PROBLEMS - Time To Fix Them!
description: Not long ago we built an AMD Ryzen ITX Dream PC for Eber but over the last while, it hasn't turned out as well as expected.  Let's go through some basic troubleshooting steps everyone should know about for a missing NVIDIA Control Panel, fans running too fast and more!    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  ASUS ROG X570-I ITX -  ASUS ROG STRIX 2080 Ti -  Sliger SM850 Case -  Ryzen 9 3950X -   Corsair Dominator Memory -  Corsair SF750 PSU -  NZXT Kraken X62 AIO -  SK Hynix 1TB SSD -   Sabrent 1TB PCIe Gen4 -   Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by the companies mentioned. This video is not sponsored. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera (Dmitry) -  Main Lens (Dmitry) -  Main Camera (Eber) -  Main Lens (Eber) -  Main 2nd Lens (Eber) -  Main Camera Mic (D & E) -  Cheap 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Awesome Slider -  Our Shotgun Mic -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #itxpcbuild #hardwarecanucks
